summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2331, for the improvement of the alley in block 42, A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 1st and 2nd Avenues, from Lenora Street to Blanchard Street, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24157 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
